body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to RT 6 Boozers. My name is Sarah, and I am here to assist you today.

Hi Sarah! Nice to meet you. I have a question about your happy hour specials.

Nice to meet you too! I'd be happy to help with that. May I have your name, please?

Sure! My name is John Anderson.

Thank you, John! To better assist you, could you also provide me with your email address?

Of course, it's john.anderson@example.com.

Great! And could you please share your phone number as well?

Sure, it’s three zero three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

Thank you for that information, John! Now, regarding our happy hour specials, we have discounts from four PM to seven PM during weekdays. We offer a range of drinks at fifty percent off.

Awesome! I’ll make sure to stop by during those hours. Thanks for the info, Sarah!

You're welcome, John! Thank you for your time, and we look forward to seeing you at RT 6 Boozers. Have a great day!
